original_title: 7 jours à Kigali, la semaine où le Rwanda a basculé
overview: What happened in Rwanda in 1994 was not simply the spontaneous eruption of inter-ethnic hatred. It was planned genocide, on an industrial scale. Something that was prepared for at least a year in advance. Lists were made. Weapons were collected. RTLM radio spent months conditioning their audience to believe that one sector of their population represented a threat.
title: 7 Days in Kigali, the week when Rwanda changed
